verbose_text: Exon 19 of ApoER2 contains a PDZ binding domain and binds PDZ containing proteins, such as the postsynaptic protein PSD-95 and the multi-adaptor protein X11alpha, a regulator of processing and trafficking of the amyloid precursor protein APP; both interactions regulate the insertion of ApoER2 into the membrane.
evidence: ApoER2 contains a PDZ-binding domain and binds PDZ
